participant_abstract.sent: Minutes from the last minute were summarized and the prototype for the RC was presented.
Additionally, finances for the RC were discussed and recalculated to fit within general budget constraints - the solar cell was dropped in favour of just a battery to come in under budget.
Finally, Project Evaluation by Team Members was carried out.

participant_decisions.sent: We decided to drop the solar cell in favour of a battery so as to meet budgetary requirements.

participant_problems.sent: No problems were noted, however, there was consensus that the whiteboard was underutilized.
